tool.name: cut

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the value will be passed in the argument list (ie. the switch won't be used)
Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
parameter_list.helptext:
Select only these fields;  also print any line that contains no delimiter character, unless the -s option is specified. Fieldlist is made up of one range, or many ranges separated by commas. Each range is one of:
N      N’th byte, character or field, counted from 1
N-     from N’th byte, character or field, to end of line
N-M    from N’th to M’th (included) byte, character or field
-M     from first to M’th (included) byte, character or field

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Do not print lines not containing delimiters.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
parameter_list.helptext: Use this value as field delimiter instead of TAB.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Use this to redirect the output of stdout into a file.

tool.description: Print selected parts of lines from each input file to standard output.
